metadata.name: TIME: Into the Metaverse | August 15, 2022 - Original Cover Art
metadata.description:
This is Micah Johnson's original art that became the TIME: Into the Metavers cover in the August 15, 2022 issue. 

Your use of the TIMEPiece NFT is subject to the License available at https://time.com/privacy/timepieces_license_agreement.html. For clarity, this limited license does not give you the right to modify the Artwork (including, as applicable, any digital TIME issue) in any way or to use the Artwork separately from the associated TIMEPiece NFT.
